name: HEAVY HVNDED Fall Drop 01 The Controller

metadata.name: HEAVY HVNDED Fall Drop 01: The Controller 1/200
metadata.description:
"The Controller", a play on console users but also a visual representation about clutch plays and those unforgettable moments of being on fire. Inspired by the heyday of The Matrix and PS1, this drop is one of 6 pieces to BLVKHVND's Fall Capsule "HEAVY HVNDED".

ICED UP (clutch up, you're on "ice")
HOT HVNDS (on fire, nothing can stop you)

After claiming, you can choose to redeem the tee. 
Token burns upon redemption.

properties.name: HEAVY HVNDED Fall Drop 01: The Controller
